name: 洪子逸
objective: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析? 課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
schedule:
1 Course Introduction
2 Introduction to Multivariate Statistical Analysis
3 Data Examining
4 Factor Analysis I
5 Factor Analysis II
6 Regression Analysis I
7 Regression Analysis II
8 Discriminate Analysis and Logical Regression
9 Midterm Exam
10 1-Way, 2-Way ANOVA
11 1-Way ANCOVA
12 MANOVA
13 Conjoint Analysis
14 Cluster Analysis
15 Multi-Dimensional Scaling
16 SEM
17 SEM
18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Performance in Class: 30%
Midterm Exam: 30%
Final Exam: 40%
materials:
1. Hair, J. F., Black, W. C., Babin, B. J., & Anderson, R. E. (2010). Multivariate data analysis, N.J., USA: Pearson.
2. Sharma, S. (1996). Applied multivariate techniques, USA: John Wiley & Sons.
